@Gexxie and everyone else who is confused:

It says 9 files in the description, because episode 1+2 are one file - the two hour pilot.
Although the series has also a two hour finale the scene release groups seem to have decided to devide it into eps 9+10.
FYI - episode 10 is the final REPACK release :).

Cheers

watched the first season , better title = failing skies

bad wooden acting , mechs look like ed209 from robocop , even after 10 episodes you feel zero emotional connection to any of them

plus the story , so aliens can destroy all our armies before a rebel chef/grandpa macgyver can figure out  armour piercing bullets/communications disruptor , hahaha lol

a spielberg branded turd is still a turd
